_sText:
This map was started shortly after the release of bhop_goldsrc as I had overwhelming requests to make a longer version of the bonus. In total, I managed to fit 10 Half-Life BSPs into one map. Brushsides are at 99.2% capacity with optimization already, otherwise I would've included more maps. Note that I modified all of the stages to improve them for auto-bhop, but I made sure they were possible on scroll as well. I've put together a playlist of some previous versions too. Many Half-Life BSPs were tested for map flow, but were cut. View it here.

Enjoy!
